runs.comm: skiddy delivery outside off and he steers him down to third man
makes room for a flashy cut but he withdraws from the shot
fires it down the leg side and Boucher does a brilliant job to glove it with one hand
makes a lot of room again but Steyn's pace is a little too quick, another miss outside the off stump
effortless, Steyn pitches it up on the pads and Watson merely chips it with minimum effort down to fine leg, the ball just lands in front of the rope
Watson exposes his stumps yet again to probably slam him over the off side but he's beaten for pace and the ball clips the top of the middle stump
clips it close to his pads down to midwicket
the ball stops on him a bit as he taps it to the off side
swivels for the pull a little too early and the ball catches the toe of the bat and rolls away
takes a pace down the pitch, exposes his stumps and carves him over extra cover, not the most attractive of shots but still effective
fires it full and he digs it out to mid-on
he mixes the length by dropping it shorter and Hamilton shapes to biff it over the on side but he tamely mishits it to Duminy at short square-leg, Hamilton was hurried onto the shot
pushed to the leg side and sets off, they scamper through
tucks it away uneasily off the front foot to mid-on

squirts out a fast yorker past the tiny window past backward point and cover point, the placement is good but the running is anything but, the fielder at cover point runs backwards fires the throw to the keeper, the batsmen amble through for the second run and there's hesitation for the third
Scotland are looking really helpless here, Steyn fires a fast yorker on the legstump and Smith is kind enough to expose it, the death rattle follows and the leg stump is flattened
he bangs in the bouncer and McCallum ducks and the ball fizzes past his helmet
another fast outswinging yorker and he gets a leading edge to cover
gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
kicks up outside off and beats the batsman
pushes a full delivery back to the bowler
nice bouncer, bangs it in on seeing McCallum come down the pitch and the batsman can only duck under it
he chips it tamely just over the umpire's head, what was he trying there?
it's a hurried single to mid-off and Morkel's throw is just wide at the bowler's end
just gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
terrific shot! Steyn drops it a bit short and Coetzer picks the length early, swivels and pulls with conviction over square leg, a spectator fumbles the catch, I told you the bug is spreading fast
doesn't quite pick the slower ball but he goes through with the shot and keeps it along the turf to fine leg
makes room to splice it over the off side but the ball fizzes past the outside edge
he gets adventurous by making room and he carves a pitched up delivery over backward point
meets the ball right in front of the stumps and tucks it to mid-on
drops the ball with soft hands at the crease and doesn't quite know whether to pinch a single or not
more out of desperation than anything else, he makes room and gets a thick outside edge to balloon over the vacant second slip region
pulls too early and the ball jabs him on the body and rolls to the on side
Appeal! The ball appeared to deflect off something as he shaped to hook but Asad Rauf was convinced there was no wood on it, he was right as the ball clipped the shoulder
gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
gets on his knee and sweeps him to deep square-leg
pushes a full delivery straight to long-off
forces it hard down the pitch

the stumps are a royal mess! Botha fires it very fast and flat, the ball lands on the blockhole and McCallum ends up playing all around it and looks back to see his leg stump splattered a yard or two away and the middle stump pushed back
forces a full delivery straight to short cover
bowls it short and gets turn, he stays back and clubs it to long-on
quicker through the air and he defends with soft hands
gets on his knee and swipes him behind square to long leg
steers it wide of short third man for an easy single
gets on his knee for another hoick but it's a mis-hit which drops short of deep square-leg
makes room and cuts hard to point and sends a bunch of pigeons scurrying in all directions
full outside off and driven to Gibbs at short cover
fires it full and quick again and Stander shapes to sweep but fails to make contact, the straighter delivery hits his back leg on the full and that's plumb
turns it away to the on side
pounds it back down the pitch
almost wicket No.7, he chips it in the air but just gets enough power to beat Botha's left
shuffles and clips him to the on side
chips down the track and drives through the line to long-off
tries to sweep but he fails to make proper contact as the ball rolls to the on side
the arm ball, he improvises nicely by dabbing him down to third man
steers it wide of cover
chips down the track and checks the loft, the ball drops just short of long-off
gets forward and squeezes it to the off side
fires in a yorker and he jams it out to backward point
squeezes it into the gap at cover point
comes down the pitch and chips it just wide of midwicket, looked like another wicket in the making
pushes it to the off side
skids through and clips his pads as he tries to work it away to the on side
pushes it softly to the covers
opens the face and steers it down to point
chips down, checks his shot and pats it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and lofts towards long-off but the ball dips and lands short of the fielder
turns it to square leg
lands on a yorker length and he squeezes it out to wide long-off
excellent stop by de Villiers at short mid-off
shapes to drive but gets an inside edge to the pads
forces it to deep midwicket
walks right across his stumps for an ambitious flick but the ball clips Boucher instead
hoicks him wide of midwicket, the ball was in the air
a little too late in the day, it's a friendly short delivery by Morkel and the ball sits up nicely for him to crash it over deep midwicket, the ball just lands over the rope
forces a friendly full toss down to long-off
gets beside the line and angles it down to third man
Coetzer's having some fun and why not, he swings at a pitched up delivery on the pads and sends the ball swirling over long-on
forces it back to the bowler, not in full control of that
slams a low full toss in the air to long-off

drops the ball on a good length on seeing the batsman advance, Coetzer makes room, chips down the track and but doesn't quite get to the pitch of the ball and as a result he miscues the loft, van der Merwe sprints to his right and catches it over his head
make that two in two, he fires this one full and flat on the stumps and Haq plays all around it and loses his offstump
clips the hat-trick ball to square leg for a single
gets a leading edge to short third man
just brushes the top of the pads and rolls away
exposes his stumps and goes for an ambitious sweep, he doesn't make proper contact
fires it full and wide outside off, he makes a lot of room and drags it back onto his off stump
bangs it in short and the ball really fizzes onto him, he fends it off but the ball drops safely in front of point
steers it to the off side and a direct hit from van der Merwe at point causes a minor delay in play as the third umpire takes a look
timber! lands on middle and leg and pretty much goes straight through the gate, the ball clips the leg stump
